item.title: Changes are happening quickly, including the implementation of "Checks on the fly.
item.description:
Let’s discuss printing “checks on the fly” in Microsoft Dynamics GP. A “check on the fly” is printed directly from the Payables Transaction Entry window by entering an amount in the check field and clicking “Print Check.” This action simultaneously records a check alongside the invoice and adjusts both cash and expense distributions. Transactions-Purchasing-Transaction Entry What happens if you need to make a correction after printing? Here’s what you can modify:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/changes-are-happening-quickly-including-the-implementation-of-checks-on-the-fly/
